full_summary:
**Tender Notice: Heater Duct, Spare Parts 100,000 BTU**

**Title**:
Heater Duct, Spare Parts 100,000 BTU

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01007872

**Amendment Number**: 1

**Solicitation Number**: W8486-228618/B

**Publication Date**: 2022-09-22

**Tender Closing Date**: Thursday, 2022-11-18T14:00:00

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for the supply of Heater Duct and associated spare parts with a capacity of 100,000 BTU. The following items are required:

- Item 1: Forklift Pocket Blower End Part No.: 1176777; Quantity: 5
- Item 2: Forklift Pocket Blower End Part No.: 1176777; Quantity: 5
- Item 3: Forklift Pocket Burner End Part No.: 1176776; Quantity: 5
- Item 4: Forklift Pocket Burner End Part No.: 1176776; Quantity: 5
- Item 5: Cover Thermostat Switch Protection Part No.: 1176957-2; Quantity: 35
- Item 6: Cover Thermostat Switch Protection Part No.: 1176957-2; Quantity: 35
- Item 7: Parts Kit Heater Duct Type Part No.: 1176948-1; Quantity: 25
- Item 8: Parts Kit Heater Duct Type Part No.: 1176948-1; Quantity: 25
- Item 9: Control Box Assembly Portable Heater Duct Type Part No.: 1177056; Quantity: 10
- Item 10: Control Box Assembly Portable Heater Duct Type Part No.: 1177056; Quantity: 10
- Item 11: Baseplate Heater Part No.: 1177077-1; Quantity: 10

These items are to be delivered to:

- Department of National Defence, 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Notre Dame St. E, Montreal, Quebec H1N 1V9
- Department of National Defence, 7 CF Supply Depot, 195 Avenue and 82nd Street, Bldg. 236, Edmonton, Alberta T5J 4J5

**Trade Agreements**:

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

- Canadian Free
